name: Fruits Mania: Fairy rescue
description:
A pack of bad raccoons are on the loose! Along with our fruits stolen by these wicked creatures, the local fairies that feed on the fruits are scared, having no choice but to hide themselves away!

It’s now up to you to save the fairies as you teach the wicked raccoons a lesson!


HOW TO PLAY
• Swipe to match 3 or more fruits.
• Collect the fruits, and complete the levels!
• With powerful boosters, it is easier to pass through a level!
• Enjoy many other various missions!
• Keep playing through the levels to get more rewards!

FEATURES
• MATCH 3 FRUIT PUZZLE
- Colorful and vivid fruits.
- Delicate matching puzzle game filled with cute characters & addictive levels!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Many puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
- The levels are to be updated periodically, you will know when to play more!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to play interface, Just swap & match.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Enjoy tasty graphics and luscious animations

• NO TIME LIMIT
- No limits means you can play anytime!

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- The game allows you to play offline.

NOTES
• "Fruits Mania : Fairy rescue" contain ads like banner, interstitial and video ads.
• "Fruits Mania : Fairy rescue" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and in-game currency to buy hints alike.


E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• http://www.bitmango.com/

Like us on FACEBOOK

Thanks for playing and helping us rescue the fairies!
